abstract: Performs the multiply operation *Y += AX* on a sparse matrix of double-precision, floating-point values.

declaration.code: func SparseMultiplyAdd(_ A: SparseMatrix_Double, _ X: DenseMatrix_Double, _ Y: DenseMatrix_Double)

overview:
## Discussion

Use this function to multiply a sparse matrix by a dense matrix and accumulate the result. The following equation is an example of a matrix-matrix multiplication where the first matrix is sparse:



Call [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseMultiplyAdd(_:_:_:_:)-86gfz] to calculate the result.

items.description: Performs the multiply operation *Y += AX* on a sparse matrix of single-precision, floating-point values.
items.name: SparseMultiplyAdd(_:_:_:)

items.description: Performs the multiply operation *Y += alpha * AX* on a sparse matrix of double-precision, floating-point values.
items.name: SparseMultiplyAdd(_:_:_:_:)

items.description: Performs the multiply operation *Y += alpha * AX* on a sparse matrix of single-precision, floating-point values.
items.name: SparseMultiplyAdd(_:_:_:_:)
